name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in building high-performance applications leveraging a robust tech stack including **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, **DataDog**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Apache Druid**. Proficient in modern programming languages such as **JavaScript**, **ReactJS**, **Elixir**, **Go**, and **Ruby**, I excel in full-stack development and system design across diverse sectors, with a focus on healthcare and finance. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that seamlessly incorporate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation.

My background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems is complemented by expertise in CI/CD automation, ensuring the delivery of robust, secure applications that meet industry compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I am well-versed in implementing MLOps workflows with tools like MLflow and Airflow. Known for proactive ownership, strategic thinking, and cross-team collaboration, I bring a collaborative spirit and a commitment to excellence, ready to drive project success with effective rapport building.

- Engaged in proactive ownership of projects through strategic thinking and rapport building with stakeholders, resulting in enhanced collaboration and project efficiency.

• Demonstrated proactive ownership and strategic thinking through successful project leadership, ensuring cross-team collaboration and fostering relationships to advance project goals.

• Championed real-time feature implementation using **Apache Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, resulting in responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking for over **10,000** active users.

• Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure user management, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust data protection across customer accounts.
